short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle deskmy functions outside the tab and update the active app status

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The plugin allows you to toggle deskmy's microphone and camera from outside its tab, changes your status, create a recording or go to Deskmy's tab.  All of this while it updates your active app status on deskmy.
